name: Astegon

aura.name: black_anklyosaur
aura.description: Can be ridden a flying mount. Increases damage dealt to ore while mounted.

description: A savage beast born of the abyss. Thou shall not stand before the beast. Thou shall not heed the beast.

skills.name: dragon_cannon
skills.description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with draconic energy at an enemy.

skills.name: spirit_flame
skills.description: Fires three balls of malice that relentlessly pursue an enemy.

skills.name: dragon_burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges draconic energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: nightmare_ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of darkness and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: draconic_breath
skills.description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

skills.name: dark_laser
skills.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.

skills.name: dragon_meteor
skills.description: Calls down numerous small meteorites and launches them at an enemy.
